body_html:
@apaszke or @soumith

I feel like the .to method in 0.4.0 is sufficient functionality for core pytorch. I still think my XPU class is useful --- because it can abstract DataParallel --- but it no longer provides functionality that the core library is sorely missing.

That being said, I'm closing this PR, but I'm going to continue to maintain XPU in my external netharn library, which is built on top of pytorch and provides a training harness and hyperparameter tracking.
